name: blogger-pwa
description: Build a PWA for your Blogger Site

scripts.kv:build: npm run generate && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.kv.json --env production --dry-run --outdir=./build/kv
scripts.kv:deploy: npm run generate && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.kv.json --env production
scripts.kv:dev: npm run generate && wrangler dev --config wrangler.kv.json
scripts.github:build: npm run generate && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.github.json --env production --dry-run --outdir=./build/github
scripts.github:deploy: npm run generate && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.github.json --env production
scripts.github:dev: npm run generate && wrangler dev --config wrangler.github.json
